ingredients.ingredient: 4 sweet potatoes, or more to taste

cookingTips: Cut sweet potatoes into uniform sticks for even cooking throughout
Toss fries with oil and seasonings in a bowl before spreading on baking sheet
Spread fries in a single layer and resist the urge to stir frequently for better crisping
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What techniques help sweet potato fries stay crispy on the outside while remaining tender inside?
